channel.title: NPC hitpoints
channel.description: OK, I have got all of the downloads, and I have the rar, script in computer LINGO, I know that to have hp with the monsters by changing something on a word pad, yet I do no know where this word pad is, please help it would be greatly appriciated =), this is on regualar (downloaded) moparscape. Thanks in advance. Also, This is in hybridscape[br][size=1]Posted at: December 11, 2006, 07:12:37 PM[/size][hr]Help please, I'm still stuck[font=Verdana][/font]

item.title: NPC hitpoints
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

heres ho get textpad its much easier to use and when you right click,click and textpad and open autospawn and put it in this format

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

push tab on your left side corner to make it go to next colume

then go into moparscape and do ::coordson and find the coords you want(coordx first and coordy next)and find the npc you want and use the format i showed you to spawn a npc

Read full topic
